name: Out Of Memory (Sutivu)
description:
You are a little robot who need to collect environmental data for recharging his stealth ability and sneak out between robots gards

Gamepad Controls:
Left stick: Movements
Right Trigger:  Data Stealth
ABXY: Take/Place Data Aera

Keyboard Controls:
WASD: Movements
Shift/Space: Data Stealth
E/F: Take/Place Data Aera

Assets already existed: 
- Music of Sound Phenomenon Fantasy Orchestra in the market place
- Minion Mesh for the player, Paragon asset by epic
- Gards Robot from the Platformer Game example in the learning tabs
